description: For that step-pepping zing you can see and feel, check out our Men’s Run Targeted Cushion Pattern Mid Crew socks. They’re made from responsibly sourced Merino wool, so they naturally resist odors, regulate temperature, and offer breathability. Plus, they’re designed with feel-good features like targeted cushioning on the ball and heel of the foot, the Virtually Seamless™ toe, and the 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in fit. To top it all off, their peppy pattern means they’ll look as good as they feel, mile after mile.
name: Smartwool Run Targeted Cushion Pattern Mid Crew Socks - Mens
